dict.acceptation: 期望；预料；要求；认为（某事）会发生；

sent.orig: Expect much from myself, but expect nothing from others.
sent.trans: 从自己中期望很多，但从别人中毫不期望。

sent.orig: Two large production base on expect two expect already all hurl to produce now.
sent.trans: 两座大型生产基地一期二期现已全部投产。

sent.orig: I certainly expect my employees to follow the rules, but above all I expect honesty.
sent.trans: 我当然希望我的员工遵守制度，但最重要的是他们能够诚实。

sent.orig: Know what to expect: Expect to hear staple interview questions: What's your biggest weakness?
sent.trans: 心中有数：对常见的面试问题要有准备，比如你最大的弱点是什么？

sent.orig: Acer Engineering Services Limited joint recognition you expect, do you expect criticism correction.
sent.trans: 联宏机电有限公司期待您的认可，也期待您批评指正。
